results.title: Metformin as possible therapy of pulmonary arterio venous malformation in HHT patients.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ may be proposed to prevent from @<m>DISEASE_Arteriovenous_Malformations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001165 @@@pulmonary arteriovenous malformation@@@ development and subsequent related complications.
